title: Jacob Flees from Laban
summary: Genesis 31 describes Jacob secretly leaving Laban with his family and possessions after sensing growing tension. Laban pursues him, but God warns Laban in a dream. The two make a covenant of peace.

faq.question: How was conflict between Laban and Jacob resolved?
faq.answer: They made a covenant and set up a heap of stones as a witness to their agreement.
